comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Thanks for your input, Ahmad Galal, wjgmspeedy, alaatours, kairoinfo4u and it is aai! 
Our curator confirms that this is the entrance to Djoser's Step Pyramid complex at Saqqara. Updates underway! (Apologies that this took a while.)
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
